link_mentions.page: List of Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls

response: Five years later, she won the bronze medal in the fours with Gill Miles, Ann Sutherland and Pam John at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester.
She was born in 1943 and won the bronze medal in the fours with Gill Miles, Ann Sutherland and Nina Shipperlee at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester.
Four years later she won another bronze in the fours with Gill Miles, Pam John and Nina Shipperlee at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester.
